title: Consumer spending on clothing in France 2008 to 2017
yAxis: Final consumption expenditure in million euros
summary: In general Final consumption expenditure in million euros has stayed the same over the Year.

Final consumption expenditure in million euros is roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, slightly increasing from 2013 to 2014, slightly decreasing from 2014 to 2016, and finally slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
Maximum Final consumption expenditure in million euros, about 36254.0 was reported at Year 2015
The lowest Final consumption expenditure in million euros, of value 35574.0 was reported at Year 2011, and 2013
